channel.title: Server wont go online
channel.description: im using utorrent and luck client and soruce and i change the 127.0.0.1 in the client to my ip and it doesnt allow me to login i portforwared with utorrent and i have no-ip thigney open all the time i choose the host but what do i do now?it wont allow me to login. can anyone suggest a begginer client and source i could use.

item.title: Server wont go online
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

try changing it to 127.0.0.0 or 0.0.0.0
cause it should allow you to login anyways since its you as the local host. and also… If your going to have others play it or have your server set for the public. you need to make up a server ip using no-ip create a port threw your windows firewall as 43594 or 5555. Check out Server Tutorials on How to Make a server. It gives a good guide on how to portfoward correctly or host regularly. etc…

Read full topic
